DOC.brief_summary: This study aim examine possible relationship hand grip strength ( HGS ) maximum inspiratory pressure ( MIP ) healthy individual .
DOC.brief_title: Correlation Between Maximal Inspiratory Pressure Hand Grip Force
DOC.detailed_description: This study aim examine possible relationship hand grip strength ( HGS ) maximum inspiratory pressure ( MIP ) healthy individual . All individual underwent assessment inspiratory muscle strength maximum inspiratory pressure , evaluation hand grip strength . MIP measure use U-type water manometer calibrate centimetre water ( cmH2O ) , HGS measure hydraulic hand dynamometer calibrate Kg .
DOC.criteria: Healthy individual age < 20 year old , pregnancy , official diagnosis lung disease Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( COPD ) , body mass index ( BMI ) > 40 , know preexisting cause neuromuscular weakness , median entrapment neuropathy carpal tunnel syndrome
